text: The continued operation of 'Cat News' is crucial for fostering collaboration and sharing best practices among felid conservationists worldwide.
This newsletter is a pillar of conservation knowledge, ensuring that the scientific community remains informed and united in its mission.
The sustained publication of 'Cat News' is a testament to the dedication of the IUCN/SSC Cat Specialist Group and its contributors.
This is a prime example of how a dedicated, specialized organization can build and maintain a valuable communication platform over decades.
The existence of 'Cat News' underscores the importance of specialized, peer-reviewed communication for advancing conservation science.
This newsletter is a vital resource for anyone involved in the practical aspects of cat conservation, offering actionable insights.
